subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: D. J. Cooper, the star junior point guard who helped No. 13-seeded Ohio upset No. 4 Michigan, chose to play in the cozier Mid-American Conference despite interest from larger programs.
snippet: D. J. Cooper, the star junior point guard who helped No. 13-seeded Ohio upset No. 4 Michigan, chose to play in the cozier Mid-American Conference despite interest from larger programs.
